direction.raw_text: I got Speech 217 moved to 10 AM, thank God. Who knows what I'll hear with the extra sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My first class in college ever. And I get an A. Gotta be the teacher. They look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should get going. (THEN) You don't know anything about car devices, do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cars not much. Devices some. They rise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercy is opening her door, starting her car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please enter your destination.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh be quiet. That's a MapGenie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is Hellspawn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In my old job, I'd have steered you to a Vortex unit. The MapGenie interface is clumsy and the menu needs too many inputs. He is reaching into the car, across her to tap the unit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was working fine. Then I think I pressed too many buttons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. The Auto On Feature is engaged. Menu. Select. Features. Auto Voice. Select. Change? Yes. On. Off. Done? Yes. Save. Back. Back. Back. Exit. While he was doing that, Mercedes was smelling what she could of Larry. She liked it. She looked at his neck, his ears. And smelled him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long was this broken?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seemed like years and years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All better now. Should be able to find your way. Nothing to do now but say goodbye. They hear a pounding. Raul is at the window inside the cafe, signaling the break is over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Boss. Back to work. (THEN) Thanks for the good news...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perry greets him at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kimosabe, holding off til after school to woo the teacher is the move of a class act. Larry turns to watch Mercedes drive away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .C.C.C. PARKING LOT - MORNING The sign says "New Term Beginning! $20 a unit! Ask about Financial Aid!" Did you notice? The cost of an education just went up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercedes has just written "Care" next to "Welcome to Shakespeare!!" up on the board. She turns. And does a quick head count. Only 6 students are enrolled. She's going to lose this one, again. Clumps up the wooden steps are heard... Calimeris, Mack, Pinedo, and Dibiasi come tramping in. Twelve students now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on his phone) I gotta get off, Baby, or I'm in hot water with Professor Tai-bo... Mercy does a Shakespearean dance of joy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is Larry with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, no. Should we track him down and drag him in here? Mercedes does her best to hide her disappointment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Seeing you all... I just thought... (THEN) Choose a seat and lets get started! The four smile at each other...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carrying a torch for Larry til it burns her hands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .C.C.C. CAMPUS - LATER Mercedes is walking to another building, another class. She may not realize it, but she is looking for Larry Crowne. Busik is busy chatting her up. Seriously chatting her up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the excitement of first day of term, I don't want to go back to my empty apartment. Do you? I need a drink and some talk and some wind- down time. Don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MATSUTANI (O.C.) Ms. Tainot? She turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. M.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MATSUTANI Larry Crowne is taking six units from me, devouring the material like a starving man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Larry's enrolled?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MATSUTANI He's continuing his education and tells me it is because of you. That your class changed his life. Mercedes finds herself smiling -- beaming...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Larry said that about me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah! I put that guy in your class. So technically, I changed his life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is a good student
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MATSUTANI And handy on a scooter. (THEN) Is there any chance you would consider having drinks with an older faculty peer who holds a PhD in Economics?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no. No offense Dr. M.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MATSUTANI The rumor is you are newly single and I was just taking a shot. Mercy looks right at Busik.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: News travels fast. Busik pretends he knows nothing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're going out, I'm not doing anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MATSUTANI Have you ever been to Hooters?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the spicy wings, yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .C.C.C. TEACHERS' PARKING LOT - LATER There is a note on Mercy's car. She takes it. "To test your MapGenie: 4225 Harbor Blvd. 2nd floor. An 'A' student." Her breath catches in her heart...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercedes is driving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right Turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it Turning right
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your destination is ahead on the right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is? That was a breeze. Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open for business with bunting and everything. Talia is eating take out sushi and reading the soy sauce packet. She is tying to check out her ass-crack tattoo to see if it really does say 'Soy Sauce'. Mercedes has arrived. Talia sees her and comes out. Lamarr is around. Patience, too. We might notice that Dell Gordo and Larry now dress exactly alike, as we've seen the same jacket once on Lance Corona.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love that blouse with that skirt but I'd show more leg if I were you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm Mercy Tainot
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bambi Romp in the Glen. Looking for Lance?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harbor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is 4227. (POINTING)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . You'll see the stairs. The tattoo parlor. Larry's scooter is right in front. As she goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little higher heels'll get you wolf whistles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Music is playing. A nice view is revealed as Mercy arrives on a nice little porch. On a little table sits a potted plant. In the potted plant is an Altoids tin. Mercy gives it a rattle. In the tin, a brand new key. Mercy takes the key. Slides it into the lock and slowly opens the door. The music gets louder. She can't see much into the tiny flat, but she can make out... Larry, arranging the last of his stuff. Mercy stands at the door until he sees her. When he does, he says nothing. But steps to her and smells her - her neck, her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you tell Ed Matsutani taking my class changed your life?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I met you. That's it. They kiss. Damn fine whammy kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No larger than the nook of his old house. Breakfast is being served. The most beautiful woman ever to wear a bathrobe has made French Toast and is settling into the Breakfast Nook. Larry Crowne has his hair all on one side of his head -- post- Afternoon-Of-Amok-Loving. His arm shows a Navy tattoo that may be old or new... Mercy Tainot glows in and out. She slides next to him, close to him The meal is perfect
direction.name: direction
